Technique: ENGOBE; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; RELIEF
Name: Lamp
Description: Bitruncate cone-shaped lamp, ovoidal in outline, with a disc that is marked by means of moulding. At the top, the beginning of a ribbon handle is preserve. Pink-coloured paste and surface covered with a reddish coating which is partially lost. On and all around the disc we find geometrical and vegetal decoration in relief, quite worn away and hard to interpret. In the light orifice signs of use can be observed.
